Row.Text: Terrain that appears in the ocean, lakes, or rivers. While usually completely submerged, some aquatic terrain breaks the surface of the water or can be visible from above.

Terrain adjacent to major rivers that regularly flood the area, depositing silt and nutrients into the soil. Floodplains can be unstable places to settle, but the richness of the land makes them highly valuable for agriculture.
Terrain covered by thick growths of medium to large plants. Vegetated areas were prized as sources of fuel and building supplies, as well as ideal places to hide during combat.

Terrain that is regularly submerged but is not deep or extensive enough to be traversable by large boats or ships. Wetlands are sources of abundant life and valuable materials such as reeds, grasses, and clay.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food,[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, and[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age. +10 Land Trade Route Range to Trade Routes from this Settlement.
+10 Land Trade Route Range to this Settlement.
+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food,[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness, and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science per Age. +2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on adjacent Marine Terrain.

+2[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science, +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture per Age. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to Coastal Marine Tiles in this Settlement. Units that move onto this Natural Wonder are teleported to a random Ocean location.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science to Coastal Marine Tiles in this Settlement. Units that move onto this Natural Wonder are teleported to a random Ocean location.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness, +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. On discovery, reveals all Mountain tiles on your continent.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness, +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture, +2[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. On discovery, reveals all Mountain tiles on your continent.

+2[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food,[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness, and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production per Age. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Vegetated Terrain in this Settlement.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Vegetated Terrain in this Settlement.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age. +1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Flat Terrain in this Settlement.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Flat Terrain in this Settlement.
+6[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age. +1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production to adjacent Rural tiles. Grants Fresh Water.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production to adjacent Rural tiles. Grants Fresh Water.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture and +4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age. +2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on adjacent Quarters.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and +4[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food per Age. +2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on adjacent Districts. Grants Fresh Water.
+2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on adjacent Districts. Grants Fresh Water.
+2[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production and +4[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness per Age. Volcano tiles.
+2[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness and +4[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production per Age. +2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Rough Terrain in this Settlement.
+2[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Rough Terrain in this Settlement.
